page.title: 08Water Lily Farm-Chickerell.
page.content: The{Water Lily Farm}covers about{8 {acres.}They have all sorts of{lilies and a total of{120 different species. The biggest lily is called the{Water {Lily Victoria. There are also{fish at the {farm.}There are five different kinds of fish and their best fish are the {Golden Orfes.}These fish eat the insects that die in the pond.The{Orfes {pond is about twenty to twenty five {feet deep.}These fish were laying their eggs earlier than usual this year. Altogether there are about{100 ponds at the Water Lily Farm. In the{smaller {ponds}there are some{lilies}called {Paul Hariot,Conqueror,Albioa,Rose Arey {and Marcarnea. Kingfishes}occasionally come out to eat the pond life. -Rachel Bennett,Claudine Hall.
